title: Add changelogFrameId field to Commit interface
description: Update /packages/core/src/types.ts to add changelogFrameId field to Commit interface (line ~93). This enables navigation to frames and is used in Phase 6 histogram. Field is optional for backward compatibility.

title: Update changelog rendering to properly display title and description
description:
Verify and enhance changelog rendering to show both title and description fields.

Current state:
- frame-builder.ts already updated to show title (16px Bold) and description (14px Regular)
- Description is rendered conditionally (only if provided)

Need to verify:
1. Test that title displays prominently in changelog entries
2. Test that description shows below title when provided
3. Test that layout works correctly when description is omitted
4. Check spacing and visual hierarchy between title and description
5. Verify Inter font loading works correctly for both fields

If issues found, enhance:
- Improve visual hierarchy/contrast between title and description
- Adjust spacing/sizing if needed
- Consider adding visual separator if helpful
- Test with long titles and descriptions

Files involved:
- packages/figma-plugin/src/changelog/frame-builder.ts (already updated)
- May need to adjust SECTION_SPACING or itemSpacing

Create changelog/index.ts public API exports
description: Create /packages/figma-plugin/src/changelog/index.ts to export public API: renderChangelogEntry from renderer, Theme/ThemeColors types from theme. Enables clean import in main.ts. Depends on all other changelog modules.

title: Update annotation rendering to display properties
description:
Update createAnnotationItem() to render properties with labels and values

Sub-tasks:
- Update createAnnotationItem() to extract properties from annotation.properties
- Render each property with label and value vertically
- Style property list with appropriate spacing and typography
- Handle edge cases (missing properties, empty arrays, malformed data)

Depends on: figma-versioning-hhn, figma-versioning-zks
Part of: figma-versioning-qwg

title: Phase 5: Changelog Rendering
description: Generate Changelog page with commit entry frames, theme-aware styling, and layout management

title: 5.1 Implement Changelog page creation/detection
description: Create /packages/figma-plugin/src/changelog/page-manager.ts with functions to find/create Changelog page. Strategy: find by exact name match 'Changelog', create if not found. Handles edge cases: recreates if user deletes/renames. ~0.5KB bundle size.

title: 5.2 Create commit entry frame generator with auto-layout
description: Create /packages/figma-plugin/src/changelog/frame-builder.ts with createCommitEntryFrame() function. Build nested auto-layout frames (600px width, auto height). Sections: Header, Message, Comments (conditional), Annotations (conditional). Lock all frames with frame.locked = true. Load Inter font. ~2KB bundle. Depends on theme.ts.

title: 5.3 Implement theme-aware styling (Light/Dark/FigJam detection)
description: Create /packages/figma-plugin/src/changelog/theme.ts with detectTheme() function and getThemeColors() for Light/Dark/FigJam themes. Detect FigJam via figma.editorType, default to Light for regular Figma. Define RGB color palettes for each theme. ~0.3KB bundle size.

title: 5.4 Implement comment section rendering within entry frames
description: Internal function in frame-builder.ts: createCommentsSection(). Returns null if no comments, otherwise renders comment frames with author, timestamp, text, nodeId. Lock all frames. Test with 0, 1, and many comments.

title: 5.5 Implement annotation section rendering within entry frames
description: Internal function in frame-builder.ts: createAnnotationsSection(). Returns null if no annotations, otherwise renders annotation frames with label and nodeId reference. Lock all frames. Test with 0, 1, and many annotations.

title: 5.6 Implement reverse chronological layout management
description: Create /packages/figma-plugin/src/changelog/renderer.ts with renderChangelogEntry() and getOrCreateContainerFrame(). Insert entries at top (reverse chronological) via container.insertChild(0). Container: VERTICAL layout, 32px gaps, locked, positioned at x=100 y=400. ~0.8KB bundle. Depends on page-manager, frame-builder, theme.

title: 5.7 Implement viewport navigation to new entries
description: Part of renderer.ts in renderChangelogEntry(). After inserting frame: switch to Changelog page, scroll viewport to entry, select frame for visual feedback. User sees result before plugin closes (1s delay).

Integrate changelog rendering into main.ts CREATE_VERSION handler
description: Update /packages/figma-plugin/src/main.ts CREATE_VERSION handler (lines 433-496). Import renderChangelogEntry, call after saveCommit, update commit with frameId, re-save. Add try/catch: succeed commit even if render fails. Delay close 1s to show result. Depends on changelog modules + types.ts.

Update commit form to match Figma version history (title + description)
description:
Update commit creation form to match Figma's native version history interface.

Changes needed:
1. Update Commit interface in types.ts: Add 'title' field (required), rename 'message' to 'description' (optional)
2. Update ui.tsx form: Add separate title input field and description textarea (match Figma's layout from screenshot)
3. Update main.ts CREATE_VERSION handler: Receive title and description separately
4. Research Figma's saveVersionHistoryAsync API to determine if it accepts title and description separately
5. Update changelog frame-builder.ts: Render title prominently and description below
6. Add migration logic: Convert existing commits with only 'message' to have title='message' and description=''
7. Update all TypeScript references from 'message' to 'title'/'description'

Benefits:
- Matches Figma's native UX
- Better structure for future LLM integration
- Clearer separation of commit summary vs details

Files to modify:
- packages/core/src/types.ts (Commit interface)
- packages/figma-plugin/src/ui.tsx (form UI)
- packages/figma-plugin/src/main.ts (handler)
- packages/figma-plugin/src/changelog/frame-builder.ts (rendering)

title: End-to-end testing of changelog rendering
description: Manual testing: first commit creates page, second reuses page, comments/annotations render conditionally, FigJam theme works, page recreates if deleted, viewport navigation works. Test on small/medium/large files. Success: bundle <10KB, render <500ms, no errors, frames locked, reverse chrono order.
